chapter.title: Introduction to &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION;
chapter.para: SCCP provides connectionless and connection-oriented network services and global title translation (GTT) capabilities above MTP Level 3. SCCP also provides extended routing, flow control, segmentation and reassembly of data services.

A global title is an address (for example, a dialed 800 number, calling card number, or mobile subscriber identification number) that is translated by SCCP into a destination point code and subsystem number. A subsystem number uniquely identifies an application at the destination signaling point. SCCP is used as the transport layer for TCAP -based services
SCCP data is sent between peers by means of Data Units (UDs).
